title: "Artificial Sweetener Ups Appetite in Women, People With Obesity"
excerpt: "Females and people with obesity may be more sensitive to artificial sweeteners, [which] may trick the brain into feeling hungry, which may in turn result in [consuming] more calories,' says a researcher."
